      • getFacets

        public java.util.List<FontFacet> getFacets()
        Description copied from interface: FontInfo
        If font facets are embedded in the document, return the list of embedded facets. The font embedding is experimental, therefore the API can change.(如果文档中嵌入了字体方面，请返回嵌入方面的列表。字体嵌入是实验性的，因此API可以更改。)
        Specified by:
        getFacets in interface FontInfo(FontInfo界面中的getFacets)
        Returns:
        the list of embedded EOT font data(嵌入的ECT字体数据列表)

      • addFontToSlideShow

        public static XSLFFontInfo addFontToSlideShow(XMLSlideShow ppt,
                                              java.io.InputStream fontStream)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Adds or updates a (MTX-) font(添加或更新（MTX-）字体)
        Parameters:
        ppt - the slideshow which will contain the font(https-包含字体的幻灯片)
        fontStream - the (MTX) font data as stream(fontStream -作为流的（NSX）字体数据)
        Returns:
        a font data object(字体数据对象)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the font data can't be stored(IOException -如果字体数据不能被存储)
        Since:
        POI 4.1.0

      • getFonts

        public static java.util.List<XSLFFontInfo> getFonts(XMLSlideShow ppt)
        Return all registered fonts(返回所有注册的字体)
        Parameters:
        ppt - the slideshow containing the fonts(https-包含字体的幻灯片)
        Returns:
        the list of registered fonts(已注册字体列表)
